subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The St. John’s men’s basketball team has signed God’s Gift Achiuwa, a 6-foot-9, 240-pound junior college all-American who becomes the ninth member of the Red Storm’s 2011-12 recruiting class.
snippet: The St. John’s men’s basketball team has signed God’s Gift Achiuwa, a 6-foot-9, 240-pound junior college all-American who becomes the ninth member of the Red Storm’s 2011-12 recruiting class.
